executiveSummary.readinessExplanation: Clear objectives and budget but largely manual operations and limited AI experience.
executiveSummary.estimatedAnnualOpportunity: $32,500 - $54,200 in annual opportunity from reduced labour and improved cash reporting

keyProblems.problem: At Akshar Business Consulting Ltd, manual data entry between systems is eating up finance and admin time every week.
keyProblems.currentCost: Your team spends about 8 hours per week on cross-system data entry, costing roughly $1,000–$1,600 per month in staff time.
keyProblems.potentialGain: Cut cross-system entry to about 1 hour per week, freeing roughly 7 hours weekly and saving about $1,000 per month while improving data accuracy for reporting.

keyProblems.problem: Invoice creation and payment processing is leaving cash and reporting unreliable and behind competitors.
keyProblems.currentCost: Creating invoices and applying payments costs about 8 hours per week and roughly $1,000–$1,600 per month in staff time, plus it drives a separate $1,750/month cash-reporting problem from unallocated payments.
keyProblems.potentialGain: Reduce invoicing and payment work to about 1 hour per week, recover faster cash visibility, and remove the $1,750/month reporting pain—roughly $1,200 per month saved in staff time plus better cash accuracy.

keyProblems.problem: Reporting and bookkeeping are a missed opportunity: leadership spends time wrangling data instead of deciding and scaling operations.
keyProblems.currentCost: Reporting and bookkeeping together cost about 6 hours per week (about $800–$1,300 per month) and slow decision-making across your homes.
keyProblems.potentialGain: Automate reconciled dashboards so reporting drops to about 1 hour per week, saving roughly $800 per month and giving leadership back the time to focus on growth and capacity planning.

directImpact: We will stop manual copy/paste by syncing bookings, timesheets, payments and invoices automatically.
We will apply received payments down to invoice level so Aquilla shows accurate cash and AR daily.
primaryBenefits: Fewer hours spent transferring data between systems, freeing finance to focus on exceptions and strategy.
Dramatically fewer unallocated payments so cash reporting is reliable and month-end is faster.
Fresh, reconciled data feeding your dashboards so leaders see the right numbers every morning.
recommendedSolutions.description: DeployAI will build a lightweight orchestration layer that links your booking, timesheet, accounting and reporting systems and automatically matches payments to invoices. We configure smart matching rules, an exception queue for finance, and scheduled data refreshes so your books and dashboards stay reconciled without manual intervention.

realWorldProof.caseStudy: A multi-site healthcare client removed duplicate entries across six systems and cut manual entry by most of their admin team.
A mid-sized professional services business automated payment allocation and reclaimed time for placements and client work.

recommendedSolutions.implementationTime: You’ll see first results in 2-4 weeks

directImpact: We will generate invoices automatically from bookings and timesheets so your team stops creating invoices by hand.

primaryBenefits: Remove repetitive invoice creation so billing is consistent and timely.
Reduce unallocated payments and improve cash visibility for each home.
Speed collections and reduce days sales outstanding so you have predictable cash flow.

realWorldProof.caseStudy: A multi-location care facility automated billing and cut invoice processing time dramatically while removing most allocation errors.
A healthcare provider automated three-quarters of invoice creation and reduced AR by a large margin.

primaryBenefits: Leadership stops preparing spreadsheets and starts making decisions in meetings.
You get daily visibility on occupancy, capacity, payroll and cash in one place.

We train one or two internal champions and hand over dashboards with clear playbooks so your team can act on clean data from day one.

realWorldProof.caseStudy: A healthcare network consolidated reporting across 50+ facilities and reduced reporting time to near zero while uncovering major savings.
